content: Hi, I made a failed attempt in 2019 to take care of what I thought was a relatively simple ticket and basically became overwhelmed and then sniped from on high by computer issues... twice. Reading the rustc dev guide, along with periodically inspecting the compiler source, it is now much more approachable today, and I've been able to send in a few (small, still! but getting bigger~) PRs as a result. Thank you so much for all the work you've put into this.
that's really wonderful news! Thanks so much :heart: for the feedback and for trying again :)
thanks for your words @Jubilee, this is great to hear and very nice that you're sending fixes upstream too :)
